attributes.title: Life is Greatest Gift From Paramashiva - Be Life Positive For Superconscious Breakthrough(3 Jan '21)
attributes.description:
3-4 JANUARY 2021, SUNDAY (IST) PAST MIDNIGHT 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*LIFE IS THE GREATEST MIRACLE, THE GREATEST CONTRIBUTION, THE GREATEST GIFT TO THE UNIVERSE FROM PARAMASHIVA.
*LIFE IS VERY EXTENSION OF PARAMASHIVA, MY OWN BEING.
*WHEN YOU REALISE AND MAKE YOURSELF LIFE POSITIVE, YOU GIVE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO YOURSELF.
*WHEN A GROUP OF HUMANITY MAKES LIFE POSITIVE DECISIONS FOR THEMSELVES, THEY GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH FOR THEIR GROUP.
*WHEN A NATION MAKES LIFE POSITIVE DECISIONS AND GOVERNANCE, IT GIVES SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ITSELF.
*IF A CIVILIZATION MAKES LIFE POSITIVE DECISIONS, IT GIVES SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ITSELF.
*IF WHOLE HUMANITY MAKES LIFE POSITIVE DECISIONS AND STRATEGIES, IT GIVES SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ITSELF.
*LIFE IS A MIRACLE, THE GREATEST GIFT FROM PARAMASHIVA.
*IN YOUR PERSONAL COGNITION ABOUT YOURSELF, AS A FIRST PERSON, BE LIFE PRO, LIFE POSITIVE.
*IN THE SECOND PERSON - RELATIONSHIP WITH THE PEOPLE IN FRONT OF YOU - BE LIFE PRO, LIFE POSITIVE.
*WITH THE THIRD PERSONS, BE LIFE PRO, LIFE POSITIVE.
*THERE IS SOMETHING CALLED FOURTH PERSON LIKE ANIMALS WHICH WE DON'T EVEN REMEMBER, ANIMALS IN THE OCEAN, FOREST. EVEN TOWARDS THEM BE LIFE POSITIVE.
*THERE IS A FIFTH PERSON - PLANTS, TREES, HILLS, RIVERS, OCEAN. BE LIFE POSITIVE EVEN TOWARDS THEM.
*TO EVERY THING BE LIFE POSITIVE.
*THIS IS THE INTRODUCTORY MESSAGE FOR SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ALL OF YOU IN INDIVIDUAL AND COLLECTIVE LEVEL.
*BE INTENSELY LIFE POSITIVE. BE INTENSELY LIFE POSITIVE. BE INTENSELY LIFE POSITIVE. 
*WHAT I AM GIVING IS A PRINCIPLE, POWERFUL REVELATION, THE GREATER SCIENCE OF HINDUISM.
*NOW THE HINDU THINK TANK SHOULD START DOING VAKYARTHA SADAS AND JEEVARTHA SADAS ON THIS REVELATION AND MAKE PRACTICAL APPLICATION METHODOLOGY, THE APPLIED SCIENCE. 
*FEARS ARE COLLECTIVE LIFE NEGATIVITY CREATING THE SNOWBALLING EFFECT ON INDIVIDUAL AND COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS.
*WHAT IS FEAR? IT IS THE LIFE NEGATIVE PERCEPTIONS ABOUT THE INSECURITIES CREATED BY OTHERS YOU CARRY WITHIN YOU ABOUT YOU AND TOWARDS OTHERS.
*YOU ARE AFRAID OF PEOPLE WHO ARE AFRAID ABOUT YOU. YOU ARE BOTHERED ABOUT OTHERS’ OPINIONS ABOUT YOU WHO ARE BOTHERED ABOUT YOUR OPINIONS ABOUT THEM.
*COLLECTIVE FEAR-CENTRIC LAWS ARE CREATED IN SUCH A WAY THAT IT CREATES SNOWBALLING EFFECT OF DELUDING THE CONSCIOUSNESS MORE AND MORE INTO LIFE NEGATIVITY AND GIVING YOU THE FEELING: THIS IS THE WAY LIFE IS.
*KAILASA IS GOING TO BREAK THAT VICIOUS CIRCLE AND MAKE IT INTO VIRTUOUS CIRCLE!
*IN KAILASA, FIRST THING IS: I AM UTTERLY FEELING SECURE AND SAFE, SO I AM DECLARING अभयं सर्वभूतेभ्यो (‘ABHAYAM SARVA BHOOTEBHYO’) TO MY FIRST CIRCLE.
*THE FEELING OF SECURITY I FEEL IN THE FIRST PERSON I AM TRANSMITTING TO THE SECOND PERSON AND THROUGH THE SECOND PERSON I TRANSMIT THAT SAME FEELING OF SECURITY - अभयं सर्वभूतेभ्यो (‘ABHAYAM SARVA BHOOTEBHYO’) TO THE THIRD PERSON.
*I DECIDE TO TREAT AND EXPERIENCE YOU ALL AS PARAMASHIVA AND MAKE YOU ALL FEEL CONFIDENT TO TREAT OTHERS AS PARAMASHIVA AND THIS RIPPLE EFFECT IS CALLED VIRTUOUS CIRCLE.
*I AM RESPONSIBLE TO START THIS VIRTUOUS CIRCLE - DHARMA CHAKRA, JNANA CHAKRA AND MAKE EVERYONE OF YOU EXPERIENCE IT AND RADIATE THIS JOY, LIFE POSITIVITY TOWARDS OTHERS. 
*FROM FIRST PERSON I WILL MAKE IT INFECTIOUS TO SECOND PERSON, FROM SECOND PERSON I WILL MAKE IT INFECTIOUS TO THIRD PERSONS, FROM THIRD PERSONS  I WILL MAKE IT INFECTIOUS TO FOURTH PERSONS, FROM FOURTH PERSON  I WILL MAKE IT INFECTIOUS TO FIFTH PERSONS, FROM FIFTH PERSONS  I WILL MAKE IT INFECTIOUS TO SIXTH PERSON. THIS IS WHAT IS VIRTUOUS CIRCLE.
*LAW OF KAILASA IS LIFE POSITIVITY.
*THE INTENSE FEELING OF SECURED, PROTECTED, NOURISHED, ENRICHED, LOVED, I EXPERIENCE FROM PARAMASHIVA, MY ANTARATMA, PARAMATMA I RADIATE THROUGH MY FIRST PERSON TO MY SECOND PERSON - YOU, KAILASA GOVERNMENT. 
*FROM MY SECOND PERSON - YOU TO THE THIRD PERSON - THEY,  THE WHOLE WORLD / HUMANITY. 
*FROM THIRD PERSON  TO FOURTH PERSONS - ALL ANIMALS BELOW THE OCEAN AND ABOVE THE EARTH. 

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4744262968994849



Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
